constructor.details: To make exact CREATE2 deployment possible, constructor is left empty. We utilize the "init" function instead.

init(bytes).details: Special function to allow a one time initialisation on deployment.

constructor.notice: Constructor is empty and not utilised.

grantTokens(address).notice: Grant tokens to receiver from faucet's own balance. Not rate limited.

isAllowedToWithdraw(address).notice: Check whether an address can request drip and is not on cooldown.

requestTokens().notice: Get tokens from faucet's own balance. Rate limited.

setWithdrawAmount(uint256).notice: Configure the drip request amount. Amount is in wei.

setWithdrawCooldown(uint256).notice: Configure the time between two drip requests. Time is in seconds.

withdrawAllTokens(address).notice: Withdraw all funds from the faucet.

withdrawTokens(address,uint256).notice: Withdraw amount of funds from the faucet. Amount is in wei.
